interaction.text: We just love the atmosphere in this store !
I ofter visit this store just when I am in the vacinity really as I can find no fault with it

There are a number of coffee outlets locally , but Costa is consistently our favourite for the best quality and strength of the coffee , best atmosphere , newspapers to read and tables always kept clean .
all good , served with a smile
No reason . It was pretty much the standard I expected .
I just enjoy the experience
store not very busy at time of visit therefore service was very quick . Store is often very busy and difficult to move around . Staff always pleasant and helpful .
everyone is always friendly
Consistant good standard of coffee provided .
It' s a regular place for me to meet friends - friendly staff and comfy !
Maybe a more varied selection of cakes patisseries etc , costa Wimborne ( not wimbourne ! ) is on the whole , full .... Room for another outlet ? ... before a rival finds a vacant premises
I have been in better stores
The store is very convenient and clean and pleasant , although I find it a little nioisy . The staff are friendly and efficient . The food and drinks are always to a good and consistant standard .
It is allways a pleasure to visit the staff food and cleanliness is excellent
Staff always helpful and friendly even when extremely busy .
I love this branch of Costa . All the baristas always have a smile , everyone of them remembers my order before I even say it and they' re always chatty & polite . Really great service .
Service too slow , not enough staff at the coffee machines , hate queueing for so long . Coffee rarely hot enough for me despite asking .
Good service , good location . ( sorry did not purchase food clicked by mistake )
Its usually good in there and fairly quick too . Did n't buy food .
Because I use it regularly and always get friendly and kind service
This is a busy outlet right at the heart of a shopping centre but it is looking very tired now and could do with a refurbishment . I enjoy Costa and have lived in Preston for 40 years .
always use this store to meet people , but as a diabetic who cant eat cheese or fish , I do struggle to find things to eat .
On way to Bristol
The toilets are in very poor condition and detract from the overall quality of the store . There is an unpleasant smell near to the door onto the outside area . We have noticed it before .
very busy store so understand tables are not always cleared straight away
enjoyable coffee sometimes have to queue but dealt with as quickley as possible , cleanness much used place but fair , toilets are ok
Happy with visit
A busy store and so imperative that people are clearing tables quickly but otherwise very happy .
Staff always helpful even though it is a very busy store . Standard of drinks very consistent .
The coffee is always good , the muffin was delicious and the staff are efficient and friendly
Staff very friendly and cheerful - has the' relaxed , feel-good' environment where you can enjoy your coffee either on your own or with friends and family -
Coffee one of the best and well made there as it can vary in strength in different Costa` s . Cake yummy but you need to work on your sandwiches
Coffee as good as ever . Toasted sandwich average - not enough filling . Staff friendly with genuine smiling faces .
The staff at the Morpeth store are always friendly and welcoming and greet you like an old friend even if it is often very busy .

This is how I found it . I have been waiting for a Costa Coffee to come to Newport as I always found that it was the best in other towns . Everything is excellent . We could do with a larger shop as it gets so busy and tables have to be cleared quickly for the next customer .
There was nothing outstanding during my visit
The staff are always friendly ! Sometimes service is slow , but could be due to the fact they are busy ! Also please bring back blackforest hot chocolate ! !
One member of staff was very abrupt the male very friendly , there was no reason as the cafe was empty . The tea spoons looked as if they had not been washed they had lipstick on them .
Great store , but with limited space as it is bookshop . Atmosphere is great there

Not visited many other Costa Coffee Shops , but thought that while the staff , service and product are great , it' s not always " spotless " and that' s at 7.00 in the morning , so not sure what state it gets into by lunchtime .

My daughter and I are regular customers at Putney and we are always welcomed with a smile from whoever is on duty . They always remember what we purchase . At busy times ( which appears to be most of the time we are there ) the clearing of tables can eb a little slow but none of the other customers seem to mind and we all adapt to the conditions .

Costa in caversham is great and has become a real part of the community with everyone meeting there . Staff are always friendly and clearly working hard and coffee is always good - it' s great to have somewhere where the kids are welcome and you can relax with friends . Only downside is that there is sometimes quite a big queue .

The man or manager ? in the cafe was very friendly on leaving , I chatted to him about newly opening cafe and How I was happy a Costa was near my home now so that I could take a walk there and treat myself to a coffee . The girl was serious and did not make eye contact or conversation whilst making my drink and appeared irritated slightly when I changed my mind from a small cup to a medium whilst I chose before she had started to make it . The person before me was asked if she wanted her points taken off her order , by the man that served me . I was n't given this option , I was only asked for the price of the order . However , both staff served me quickly and efficiently and I really enjoyed my visit
The volume of custom speaks for itself !

I would have rated higher but on my visit I was only able to pay with cash as the machine was not working . Based upon the card machine not working I was limited to only buying a coffee , if it had been working my I would have made a bigger purchase .
staff friendly nice atmosphere no problem to make my coffee the way i like it
Half of the store was closed off with chairs and some tables were not cleared
There is always a wait to be served when we have visited this store , I' m hoping the service gets quicker as people have been there a bit longer .
I really enjoyed the visit to this store
the people are very friendly .... unfortunately the tables are often left with used cups etc for a long time and are often dirty , and this gives the feeling that the cleaniness overall is poor . .
Very happy with staff and coffee / tea . There was a bit of a backlog of clearing tables when we arrived , but staff got round to it when there was an oppertunity . Muffins were a bit dry , but ok .
Staff friendly but extremely busy , they work fast and effiently , there were some tables that needed clearing , but on the whole the place was clean .

I usually go to the Gyle Costa where the staff are fabulous so it' s difficult to compare staff at a Costa I do n't often visit - that is the only reason I did n't rate them as Excellent - it was nothing against them .
My small skinny latte was slightly bitter - not usually an issue as I love Costa coffee , maybe it was something to do with the batch of beans ?

Speed of service slow due to mix up in the order very few customers need to organise who is doing what more efficiently . Overall a good experience problems probably just teething due to it being new will happily stop there again .
Tables were clean , floor not so clean . Good service , nice drinks . A few more " sofa & arm chair " seats would be good , as I prefer these to sitting up at a table .

The store is close to my regular shops , so I go fairly regularly . The staff are unfailingly friendly and helpful but it is often very busy and sometimes the store looks messy . But this is not due to lasiness by the staff but just I think due to the volume of customers

It' s fantastic that you' ve opened in Swaffham - a welcome addition to the town ! I have just moved down from St Andrews , where I used Costa almost on a daily basis . I have missed my coffees in the morning ! So pleased that you are here ! Just like the fantastic service I am used to , the staff were very friendly & welcoming in Swaffham too ! Congratualtions ! !
Sometimes the cappucino is a bit light ! ! ! ie . a lot more fluff than coffee ! ! That said always tastes great .

Quick , friendly service , excellent product . Good atmosphere . Thoroughly enjoyed my visit.Clenliness 8 as the tables could have been cleared and cleaned quicker as they were not busy . ( a bit nit picking really , but you did ask )
I use this store a lot and am generally pleased with the store . Sometimes though they could clean up after guest leave a bit quicker .
Over the last couple of weeks of visiting , staff have been cleaning the store regularly
Use it regularly . Staff always cleaning and always friendly
The shop was clean and the staff where polite along with good drinks .
All the staff at the Gyle are very friendly and well mannered
Like coffie
Although the drinks and food purchased were fine , the service was a little slow , I' ve been in there a number of times , but this visit was slow .
Staff always friendly and could not do enough for you , it feels as if you are sitting at home
I have been in this store several times and everytime the service has been good and the food and drinks are always excellent .
There were few customers at the time so I' ll watch the service next time to see how they cope . My only lower rating was because not all the tables had been kept clean .
Friendly and very helpful
It was a busy day and the staff were under pressure to perform and there was no newspapers to read

Cafe crowded , difficulty in finding a seat , noisey young children running around . Coffee cup overfilled and coffee therefore slopped in saucer . Staff very busy , therefore service very' off hand' - not a welcoming environment .
I love this costa , it' s so frendly and i also love the drive though when i' m in a rush
The Crouch End Costa is my regular haunt not least of all because the staff are extremely friendly , helpful and welcoming . It' s also a very nice place to just' be' .

My sister and I ara regular customers .We go straight there whenever we meet up as the atmosphere is friendly , the coffee delicious ( have not had a problem one so far ) Not 10/10always room for improvement in anything .
